job_history.work_description: Compile reports and supporting schedules for inclusion in OPC's monthly financial/statistical operating reports and SEC filings as well as RUS (Rural Utilities Services) filings. Collaborated extensively with auditors during preliminary and year-end audit processes.

Maintain revenue aspects to include billing, collections, and variance analysis. Audit, balance, resolve, or reconcile discrepancies between payments, receipts, accounts, and/or source documents; posts transactions in accounts, journals, and ledgers.

Participated in the largest Restatement in US history of financials in accordance with GAAP for accounting periods 1999-2004 as directed by Securities Exchange Commission (SEC). Assisted client management with analysis and assessment of internal controls including but not limited to documentation and testing of policies/procedures under guidelines established by Sarbanes Oxley Act (SOX).

Reviewed and prepared consolidated Financial Statements, as well as footnotes to the financial statements and Management's Discussion and Analysis in Coke's 10-K and 10-Q. Compiled the Quarterly earnings release with the review and preparation of the income statement.

Assisted in the preparation of consolidated reporting for internal & external agencies. Supervision of 3 direct reports (assistant controller, senior and staff accountants). Provided variance analysis to executive management highlighting key revenue metrics and market trends.

Responsible for oversight of GL, audit, budget, consolidation, and financial reporting processes. Facilitated conversion of new accounting software and chart of account processes. Supervision of 2 staff accountants and HR administrator.

Responsible for all accounting, general ledger, and financial statement reporting related to $26M in domestic syndicated radio advertising sales revenue. Developed and implement revenue recognition for unusual activities such as trade and cross-media deals.
Compiled and reconciled annual sales on a monthly basis and review of corporate agreements. Prepared monthly P & L statements for directors to measure performance against sales targets.
Responsible for monthly reporting of subscriber billing of regional cable service to affiliates, payment tracking, allocations, reversals, forecasts, actual, and journal entries.

skills.explanation: Extensive experience in preparing and reviewing financial statements, including consolidated reports, footnotes, and Management's Discussion and Analysis, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.explanation: Over 20 years of experience in various accounting roles, including controller, assistant controller, and senior accountant, demonstrating expert-level proficiency in accounting principles and practices.

skills.explanation: Proven track record of analyzing financial data, identifying trends, and providing insights to executive management, indicating expert-level skills in financial analysis.

skills.name: Revenue Recognition
skills.explanation: Developed and implemented revenue recognition policies for unusual activities, such as trade and cross-media deals, demonstrating strong proficiency in revenue recognition.

skills.name: Financial Planning and Budgeting
skills.explanation: Experience in preparing budgets, forecasts, and financial plans, indicating strong proficiency in financial planning and budgeting.

skills.name: Leadership and Management
skills.explanation: Supervised teams of accountants and financial analysts, demonstrating strong leadership and management skills.

skills.name: Auditing and Compliance
skills.explanation: Participated in audits and ensured compliance with regulatory requirements, such as SOX, indicating strong proficiency in auditing and compliance.

skills.explanation: Facilitated the conversion of new accounting software and chart of account processes, demonstrating solid working proficiency in financial software and systems.
